effect.black_white: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.black_2_white_2: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

short_effect.black_white: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
